author: gua00va
content: How can a "surround vote" actually occur?? Cant seem to understand

author: peter.davies
content:
A surround vote occurs if you decide an epoch is finalized and then change your mind.

The two situations where this  is plausible that I am aware of are:
1. You are a malicious attacker attempting to undermine the consistency of finalization.
2. An invalid chain is finalized  because a client bug affects two thirds of validators.
